Hydras/nightlight/Perceptor/darkhawk

"I CURSE YOU ALL!!!!!" boomed Hydras while he stormed towards the 
cellblocks, while Perceptor connected his usb and up loaded the emergency 
lights and the auto-guns.

darkhawk ran towards the cell blocks ready for everything.

******************************************

Nightlight smiled with relief, it was Rodimus.

"i'm here"said the female while she left her hide out"i tried to reach the 
throne room... I"

She Gasped, she saw the autobot's symbol in Rodimus's chest, she felt 
surpriced and betrayed. Tears started to fell down, she loved him but he 
betrayed her faction; everithing that he told were lies. She just liked to 
move a way there, and ran, without realize towards the cell block area.
